subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Angels rallied in the eighth inning and beat the Cleveland Indians, 6-5, on Sunday to give Mike Scioscia his 1,000th victory as a major league manager.
snippet: The Los Angeles Angels rallied in the eighth inning and beat the Cleveland Indians, 6-5, on Sunday to give Mike Scioscia his 1,000th victory as a major league manager.
